about.title: About Company
aboutText: We design, build and service modern water infrastructure with a focus on reliability, innovation and sustainable efficiency.
companyStructureDescription1: Our group unites specialized companies covering engineering, production, construction and technical service in the water sector.
companyStructureDescription2: Synergy between expertise areas lets us deliver turnkey solutions of any scale.

companyAquaInterDesc: Construction, installation and service of water supply and sewer systems.

companyKarittAquaDesc: Production of polymer/composite and polymer products.
footerAbout: Design, construction and servicing of modern water supply and sewer infrastructure across regions.

serviceTypesIntro: Comprehensive technical capabilities covering construction, installation, repair and logistics.
serviceMaintenanceIntro: We ensure stable, efficient and safe operation of water & wastewater infrastructure.

productMetalStructuresDesc: Frames, platforms and custom assemblies for equipment.
productPEWellsDesc: Factory assembled PE chambers for fast installation.

about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.text: To empower Uzbekistan's energy infrastructure by delivering cutting-edge equipment and technical solutions that ensure reliability, efficiency, and sustainability for critical industrial projects.
about.vision.title: Our Vision
about.vision.text: To be the most trusted partner for energy infrastructure equipment in Central Asia, recognized for technical excellence, reliable delivery, and comprehensive project support.
